sqlMap.select:
SELECT BIN_ReCalcInfoID AS reCalcInfoId, BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, ISNULL(BIN_MemberClubID,0) AS memberClubId, CONVERT(varchar(30),ReCalcDate,121) AS reCalcDate FROM Members.BIN_ReCalcInfo WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
ReCalcType = '0' AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT A.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, A.MemberCode AS memberCode, A.BillCode AS billId, CONVERT(varchar(30),A.SaleTime,121) AS ticketDate, ISNULL(A.Amount, 0) AS amount, A.SaleType AS tradeType, A.Channel AS channel, A.BillCodePre AS billCodePre, B.DepartCode AS countercode, C.EmployeeCode AS baCode FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON A.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN (SELECT X.BIN_SaleRecordID, MAX(Y.EmployeeCode) AS EmployeeCode FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord X WITH(nolock) JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecordDetail Y WITH(nolock) ON X.BIN_SaleRecordID=Y.BIN_SaleRecordID WHERE X.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND X.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND X.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
AND X.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
GROUP BY X.BIN_SaleRecordID) C ON A.BIN_SaleRecordID=C.BIN_SaleRecordID WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
A.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
A.SaleTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#BDFROMTIME#,120) AND
A.SaleTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#reCalcDate#,120) AND
(A.BillModel IS NULL OR A.BillModel IN ('0','1','3','4')) AND (A.IsPoint IS NULL OR A.IsPoint <> '0') AND A.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY ticketDate

SELECT A.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, A.MemberCode AS memberCode, A.BillCode AS billId, CONVERT(varchar(30),A.BillCreateTime,121) AS ticketDate, ISNULL(A.Amount, 0) AS amount, A.SaleType AS tradeType, A.DataSource AS channel, NULL AS billCodePre, A.EmployeeCode AS baCode, B.DepartCode AS countercode, '1' AS ESFlag FROM Sale.BIN_ESOrderMain A WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON (A.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BillCreateTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#reCalcDate#,120) AND A.BillType = '2' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY A.BillCreateTime

SELECT B.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, B.MemCode AS memCode, B.UsedCount AS usedCount, B.MemberLevel AS memberLevel, B.CurBtimes AS curBtimes, B.CurPoints AS curPoints, B.TotalAmounts AS totalAmounts, CONVERT(varchar(30),B.BusinessTime,121) AS ticketDate, B.Reason AS reasonText, A.TradeNoIF AS billId, A.TradeType AS tradeType, A.Channel AS channel, A.Countercode AS countercode, A.BaCode AS baCode, A.SubTradeType AS subTradeType, A.MaintainType AS maintainType, A.TmRecordId AS tmRecordId, A.TmRecallFlag AS tmRecallFlag, A.BIN_MemUsedInfoID AS memUsedInfoId FROM Members.BIN_MemUsedInfo A, Members.BIN_MemUsedDetail B WHERE A.BIN_MemUsedInfoID = B.BIN_MemUsedInfoID AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND B.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
B.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
B.BusinessTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#reCalcDate#,121) AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY B.BusinessTime

SELECT A.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, A.MemCode AS memCode, CONVERT(varchar(30),A.CampaignOrderTime,121) AS ticketDate, A.TradeNoIF AS billId, A.TradeType AS tradeType, A.OrderCounterCode AS countercode, B.EmployeeCode AS baCode, ISNULL(A.PointRequired, 0) AS totalPointRequired, ISNULL(A.Quantity, 0) AS totalQuantity, ISNULL(A.Amout, 0) AS totalAmout, A.MachineCode AS machineCode FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Employee B WITH(nolock) ON (A.Opeartor = B.BIN_EmployeeID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.CampaignOrderTime >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#reCalcDate#,121) AND A.MqWaitFlag = '0' AND A.State <> 'CA' AND ISNULL(A.PointRequired, 0) > 0 AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
AND A.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
ORDER BY A.CampaignOrderTime

SELECT B.BIN_ProductVendorID AS productVendorId, B.GiftType AS giftType, B.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, ISNULL(B.Quantity, 0) AS quantity, ISNULL(B.Amout, 0) AS amout, ISNULL(B.PointRequired, 0) AS pointRequired FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(nolock) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail B WITH(nolock) ON (A.BIN_CampaignOrderID = B.BIN_CampaignOrderID) WHERE A.TradeNoIF = #billId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#

SELECT TOP 1 A.Name AS memberName, A.JoinDate AS joinDate, A.JoinTime AS joinTime, A.GrantMemberLevel AS grantMemberLevel, A.InitialMemLevel AS initialMemLevel, A.InitialDate AS initialDate, A.BirthYear + A.BirthDay AS memBirthday, ISNULL(A.MemberLevel, 0) AS membLevel, A.LevelStatus AS levStatus, ISNULL(A.MemInfoRegFlg, 0) AS memRegFlg, ISNULL(A.ReferrerID, 0) AS referrerId, CONVERT(varchar,A.InitLevelStartDate,120) AS initStartDate, CONVERT(varchar,A.InitLevelEndDate,120) AS initEndDate, B.MemCode AS memCode, A.ChannelCode AS channelCode, A.CounterCodeBelong AS counterCbl, convert(varchar, A.WechatBindTime, 120) AS wechatBindTime, C.InitTotalAmount AS initTotalAmount FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo A JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = B.BIN_MemberInfoID AND B.ValidFlag = '1' LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberExtInfo C ON (A.BIN_MemberInfoID = C.BIN_MemberInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# ORDER BY B.CardValidFlag DESC, B.CardCount DESC

SELECT BIN_ClubLevelID AS clubLevelId, ISNULL(GrantMemberLevel, 0) AS grantMemberLevel, ISNULL(MemberLevel, 0) AS membLevel, ISNULL(InitialMemLevel,0) AS initialMemLevel, convert(varchar,InitialDate,23) AS initialDate FROM Members.BIN_MemClubLevel WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
SELECT ClubCode AS clubCode FROM Members.BIN_MemberClub WHERE BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#

SELECT BIN_MemberClubID AS memberClubId FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# GROUP BY BIN_MemberClubID UNION SELECT A.BIN_MemberClubID AS memberClubId FROM Members.BIN_MemUsedDetail A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Members.BIN_MemUsedInfo B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_MemUsedInfoID = B.BIN_MemUsedInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND B.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# GROUP BY A.BIN_MemberClubID UNION SELECT BIN_MemberClubID AS memberClubId FROM Members.BIN_MemClubLevel WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# GROUP BY BIN_MemberClubID

SELECT TOP 1 NewValue AS newValue FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND RecordKbn = #recordKbn# AND TradeType <> 'MB' AND ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY CalcDate DESC, TicketDate DESC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_MemberInfo SET MemberLevel = #memberLevelId#, UpgradeFromLevel = #oldMemberLevelId#, LevelStatus = #levelStatus#, LevelStartDate = #levelStartDate#, LevelEndDate = #levelEndDate#, LevelChangeType = #changeType#, FirstBillID = #firstBillID#, LevelAdjustDay = #levelAdjustDay#,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#

UPDATE Members.BIN_MemClubLevel SET MemberLevel = #memberLevelId#, UpgradeFromLevel = #oldMemberLevelId#, LevelStartDate = #levelStartDate#, LevelEndDate = #levelEndDate#, LevelChangeType = #changeType#, FirstBillID = #firstBillID#, LevelAdjustDay = #levelAdjustDay#, TotalAmount = #totalAmounts#,
WHERE BIN_ClubLevelID = #clubLevelId#

UPDATE Members.BIN_MemberPoint SET TotalPoint = #totalPoint#, TotalChanged = #totalChanged#, ChangablePoint = #changablePoint#, TotalDisablePoint = #totalDisablePoint#, PreDisableDate = #preDisableDate#, PreDisPointTime = #preDisPointTime#,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#

UPDATE Members.BIN_MemberPoint SET LastChangeTime = GETDATE(),
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT LevelCode FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevel WHERE BIN_MemberLevelID = #memberLevelId#
SELECT BIN_RuleID AS ruleId, RuleContent AS ruleContent FROM Campaign.BIN_Rule WHERE ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT TOP 1 OldValue AS oldValue, NewValue AS newValue, TradeType AS tradeType, BillID AS billId, ChangeType AS changeType, CONVERT(varchar(30),TicketDate,121) AS ticketDate FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
RecordKbn = #recordKbn# AND TradeType <> 'MB' AND TicketDate < convert(datetime, #ticketDate#, 121) AND
(ChangeType = '1' OR ChangeType = '2') AND
ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY CalcDate DESC, TicketDate DESC

SELECT TOP 1 CONVERT(varchar,TicketDate,120) AS ticketDate FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND RecordKbn = 5 AND TicketDate < convert(datetime, #reCalcDate#, 121) AND ValidFlag = '1' GROUP BY CONVERT(varchar,TicketDate,120) HAVING COUNT(1) > 1 ORDER BY TicketDate
SELECT Grade FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevelDetail WHERE BIN_MemberLevelID = #memberLevelId# AND FromDate <= CONVERT(date,#acquiTime#) AND ToDate >= CONVERT(date,#acquiTime#)

SELECT MemCode AS memCode, BillID AS billId, ReCalcCount AS reCalcCount, TradeType AS tradeType FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
RecordKbn = #recordKbn# AND TicketDate >= convert(datetime, #reCalcDate#, 121) AND ValidFlag = '0' ORDER BY TicketDate DESC

SELECT MemCode AS memCode, TradeNoIF AS tradeNoIF, ReCalcCount AS reCalcCount, TradeType AS tradeType, convert(varchar, ChangeDate, 121) AS changeDate, ISNULL(Point, 0) AS point, ISNULL(Amount, 0) AS amount, ISNULL(Quantity, 0) AS quantity FROM Members.BIN_PointChange WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
ChangeDate >= convert(datetime, #pointReCalcDate#, 121) AND ValidFlag = '0' ORDER BY ChangeDate DESC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord SET ValidFlag = '0', ReCalcCount = ReCalcCount + 1,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
TradeType <> 'IP' AND TicketDate >= convert(datetime, #reCalcDate#, 121)

UPDATE Members.BIN_PointChange SET ValidFlag = '0', ReCalcCount = ReCalcCount + 1, ClearFlag = case when (TradeType = 'PC') then ClearFlag else NULL end,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
ChangeDate >= convert(datetime, #pointReCalcDate#, 121)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,ChangeDate,120) AS clearDate FROM Members.BIN_PointChange WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ChangeDate >= convert(datetime, #pointReCalcDate#, 121) AND TradeType = 'PC' AND ValidFlag = '1'
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
ORDER BY ChangeDate

SELECT A.BIN_PointChangeID AS pointChangeId, A.TradeNoIF AS tradeNoIF, A.MemCode AS memCode, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.ChangeDate,120) AS ticketDate, B.Countercode AS countercode, B.BaCode AS baCode, C.UsedCount AS usedCount, C.BIN_MemberInfoID AS oldMemberId FROM Members.BIN_PointChange A LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemUsedInfo B ON (A.RelevantUsedNo = B.TradeNoIF AND B.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemUsedDetail C ON (B.BIN_MemUsedInfoID = C.BIN_MemUsedInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.ChangeDate >= convert(datetime, #pointReCalcDate#, 121) AND A.RelevantUsedNo IS NOT NULL AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Members.BIN_PointChange SET RelevantUsedNo = #relevantUsedNo# WHERE BIN_PointChangeID = #pointChangeId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(BIN_PointChangeID) FROM Members.BIN_PointChange WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ChangeDate >= convert(datetime, #pointReCalcDate#, 121)

SELECT TOP 1 convert(datetime, ChangeDate, 121) AS changeDate FROM Members.BIN_PointChange WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND TradeType = 'PC' AND ClearFlag = 1 ORDER BY ChangeDate desc

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(Point, 0)),0) AS subPoint FROM Members.BIN_PointChange WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ChangeDate > convert(datetime, #firstPCDate#, 121) AND ISNULL(Point, 0) < 0 AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
AND BIN_MemberInfoID >= #LASTMEMBERID#

SELECT A.BIN_MemberLevelID AS memberLevelId, A.LevelCode AS levelCode, A.Periodvalidity AS periodValidity, B.Grade AS grade FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevel A JOIN Members.BIN_MemberLevelDetail B ON A.BIN_MemberLevelID = B.BIN_MemberLevelID

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord A WITH(nolock) WHERE
A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.DataStatus = '1'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord( BIN_OrganizationInfoID, BIN_BrandInfoID, BIN_MemberInfoID, MemCode, BillID, TradeType, RecordKbn, OldValue, NewValue, TicketDate, CalcDate, BIN_RuleIDs, ReCalcCount, Reason, ChangeType, SubCampaignCodes, BIN_OrganizationID, CounterCode, BIN_EmployeeID, EmployeeCode, Channel, DataStatus, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatedBy, CreatePGM, UpdateTime, UpdatedBy, UpdatePGM, ModifyCount )VALUES( #organizationInfoId#, #brandInfoId#, #memberInfoId#, #memCode#, #billCode#, #billType#, #recordKbn#, #oldValue#, #newValue#, #ticketDate#, #calcDate#, #ruleIds#, #reCalcCount#, #reason#, #changeType#, #subCampCodes#, #organizationId#, #counterCode#, #employeeId#, #baCode#, #channel#, '0', #validFlag#, #createTime#, #createdBy#, #createPGM#, #updateTime#, #updatedBy#, #updatePGM#, #modifyCount# )

INSERT INTO Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord (BIN_OrganizationInfoID, BIN_BrandInfoID, BIN_MemberInfoID, MemCode, BillID, TradeType, RecordKbn, OldValue, NewValue, TicketDate, CalcDate, BIN_RuleIDs, ReCalcCount, Reason, ChangeType, SubCampaignCodes, BIN_OrganizationID, CounterCode, BIN_EmployeeID, EmployeeCode, Channel, DataStatus, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatedBy, CreatePGM, UpdateTime, UpdatedBy, UpdatePGM, ModifyCount) SELECT BIN_OrganizationInfoID, BIN_BrandInfoID, BIN_MemberInfoID, MemCode, BillID, TradeType, RecordKbn, OldValue, NewValue, TicketDate, CalcDate, BIN_RuleIDs, ReCalcCount, Reason, ChangeType, SubCampaignCodes, BIN_OrganizationID, CounterCode, BIN_EmployeeID, EmployeeCode, Channel, DataStatus, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatedBy, CreatePGM, UpdateTime, UpdatedBy, UpdatePGM, ModifyCount FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecordHistory WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND TicketDate >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #reCalcDate#, 121)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecordHistory WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND TicketDate >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #reCalcDate#, 121)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TOP 1 OldValue AS oldValue, NewValue AS newValue, TradeType AS tradeType, BillID AS billId, ChangeType AS changeType, CONVERT(varchar(30),TicketDate,121) AS ticketDate FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecordHistory WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND
BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId# AND
RecordKbn = #recordKbn# AND TradeType <> 'MB' AND TicketDate < convert(datetime, #ticketDate#, 121) AND
(ChangeType = '1' OR ChangeType = '2') AND
ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY CalcDate DESC, TicketDate DESC
SELECT InitTotalAmount AS initTotalAmount FROM Members.BIN_MemberExtInfo WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#

SELECT TOP 1 NewValue AS newValue, BillID AS billId, CONVERT(varchar(30),TicketDate,121) AS ticketDate, MemCode AS memCode, BIN_RuleIDs AS ruleIds, ValidFlag AS validFlag, ISNULL(ReCalcCount, 0) AS reCalcCount FROM Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND RecordKbn = #recordKbn# AND TradeType = 'MB'
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
ORDER BY CalcDate DESC, TicketDate DESC
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_RuleExecRecord SET CalcDate = #calcDate#, ValidFlag = '1' WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BillID = #billId#
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT TOP 1 MemCode AS memCode, BaCode AS baCode, CounterCode AS counterCode, GrantDate AS grantDate, GrantTime AS grantTime FROM Members.BIN_MemCardInfo WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# ORDER BY CardCount
SELECT TOP 1 BaCode AS baCode, CounterCode AS counterCode FROM Members.BIN_MemCardInfo WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND MemCode = #memCode#

SELECT TOP 1 BaCode AS baCode, CounterCode AS counterCode, convert(varchar, JoinTime, 120) as joinTime FROM Members.BIN_MemClubLevel WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_MemberInfo SET MemberLevel = #curLevelId#, GrantMemberLevel = #grantMemberLevel#, UpgradeFromLevel = #upgradeFromLevel#, LevelStatus = #levelStatus#, LevelStartDate = #levelStartDate#, LevelEndDate = #levelEndDate#, LevelChangeType = #changeType#, FirstBillID = #firstBillId#, LevelAdjustDay = #levelAdjustDay#,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#

UPDATE Members.BIN_MemClubLevel SET MemberLevel = #curLevelId#, GrantMemberLevel = #grantMemberLevel#, UpgradeFromLevel = #upgradeFromLevel#, LevelStatus = #levelStatus#, LevelStartDate = #levelStartDate#, LevelEndDate = #levelEndDate#, LevelChangeType = #changeType#, FirstBillID = #firstBillId#, LevelAdjustDay = #levelAdjustDay#,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT TOP 1 convert(varchar, SaleTime, 120) AS saleTime FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WITH(nolock) WHERE BillCode = #billCodePre# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#

SELECT BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, CONVERT(VARCHAR, ChangeDate, 120) AS clearedTime, ValidFlag AS validFlag FROM Members.BIN_PointChange WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND ChangeDate >= convert(datetime, #pointReCalcDate#, 121) AND TradeType = 'PC' ORDER BY ChangeDate

SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(ClearedPoints, 0) AS clearedPoints, ISNULL(ReSendCount, 0) AS reSendCount, BIN_OrganizationInfoID AS organizationInfoId, BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, MemCode AS memCode, AfterPoints AS afterPoints, ClearedTime AS clearedTime, ClearedEndTime AS clearedEndTime FROM Members.BIN_PointsClearRecord WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND ClearedTime = #clearedTime# ORDER BY reSendCount DESC

SELECT MIN(T.saleTime) AS saleTime FROM( SELECT convert(varchar, MIN(SaleTime), 120) AS saleTime FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord WITH(nolock) WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
AND (BillModel IS NULL OR BillModel IN ('0','1','3','4')) AND (IsPoint IS NULL OR IsPoint <> '0') UNION SELECT convert(varchar, MIN(BillCreateTime), 120) AS saleTime FROM Sale.BIN_ESOrderMain WITH(nolock) WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BillType = '2' ) T

SELECT TOP 1 convert(varchar, A.SaleTime, 120) AS joinTime, A.BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationID, B.DepartCode AS counterCode, C.EmployeeCode AS BAcode FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord A WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON A.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID JOIN (SELECT X.BIN_SaleRecordID, MAX(Y.EmployeeCode) AS EmployeeCode FROM Sale.BIN_SaleRecord X WITH(nolock) JOIN Sale.BIN_SaleRecordDetail Y WITH(nolock) ON X.BIN_SaleRecordID=Y.BIN_SaleRecordID GROUP BY X.BIN_SaleRecordID) C ON A.BIN_SaleRecordID=C.BIN_SaleRecordID WHERE A.BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#
AND A.BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
AND A.SaleType <> 'SR' ORDER BY A.SaleTime
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_MemClubLevel SET
MemberLevel = #memberLevelId#, UpgradeFromLevel = #oldMemberLevelId#, LevelStartDate = #levelStartDate#, LevelEndDate = #levelEndDate#, LevelChangeType = #changeType#, FirstBillID = #firstBillID#, LevelAdjustDay = #acquiTime#,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_MemberClubID = #memberClubId#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO Members.BIN_MemClubLevel( BIN_MemberInfoID, BIN_MemberClubID, MemberLevel, UpgradeFromLevel, LevelChangeType, LevelAdjustDay, FirstBillID, LevelStartDate, LevelEndDate,
)VALUES( #memberInfoId#, #memberClubId#, #memberLevelId#, #oldMemberLevelId#, #changeType#, #acquiTime#, #firstBillID#,
CONVERT(DATETIME, #levelStartDate#, 121),
null,
CONVERT(DATETIME, #levelEndDate#, 121),
null,
)
sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_TmallPointID AS tmallPointId, TmallMixMobile AS tmallMixMobile FROM Members.BIN_TmallPointInfo WHERE RecordId = #tmRecordId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_TmallPointInfo SET PTResult = #ptResult#, PTFlag = #ptFlag#, ErrorCode = #tmErrCode#,
WHERE BIN_TmallPointID = #tmallPointId#

UPDATE Members.BIN_MemUsedInfo SET
TmRecallFlag = #tmallRecallFlag#,
ValidFlag = #usedVdFlag#,
WHERE BIN_MemUsedInfoID = #memUsedInfoId#
